publication.abstract: Summary: By linking differential gene expression to the chromosomal localization of genes, one can investigate microarray data for characteristic patterns of expression phenomena involving sizeable parts of specific chromosomes. We have implemented a statistical approach for identifying significantly differentially expressed chromosome regions. We demonstrate the applicability of the approach on a publicly available data set on acute lymphocytic leukemia. Â© The Author 2004. Published by Oxford University Press. All rights reserved.
publication.title: MACAT - Microarray chromosome analysis tool

summary.description: This library contains functions to investigate links between differential gene expression and the chromosomal localization of the genes. It implements an statistical approach for identifying significantly differentially expressed chromosome regions. The functions have been tested on a publicly available data set about acute lymphoblastic leukemia.
summary.name: macat
